content: Which French fashion designer, known for his avant-garde style and use of unconventional materials, created Madonna's iconic cone bra for her 1990 Blond Ambition World Tour?

I believe you're referring to Jean Paul Gaultier. He is a renowned French fashion designer celebrated for his innovative and sometimes provocative designs. Gaultier is well-known for his avant-garde approach and his ability to push boundaries in the fashion industry. One of his most famous creations is indeed the cone bra that Madonna wore during her 1990 Blond Ambition World Tour. This design not only became an iconic moment in both fashion and music history but also reflected Gaultier's signature style of combining traditional elements with modern,有时甚至是挑战性的设计。
